title: Forum Novelties Victorian Ghost Costume, Small
description: Scare up some fun in this Victorian era style full-length dress with a ghostly twist. Dress features a high neckline, long sleeves and lace overlay with skull pattern. Forum Novelties has become a leader in the Halloween industry, as well as the Joke, Trick, Magic and Novelty gift item business. Over the past 30 years our product line has evolved to meet customer needs and consumer buying trends. We are the proud manufacturers, importers, and distributors of over 8,000 items ranging from baby costumes, to adult and plus-size costumes, to pet costumes. Look to Forum Novelties for all of your Halloween, luau, Christmas, Mardi Gras, and St. Patrick's Day supplies. From funny to frightening, Forum has it all.
